flawed_nl_solution:
Marianne is 20 - 8 = <<20-8=12>>12 years older than Bella.
Bella will turn 18 in 18 - 8 = <<18-8=11>>11 years.
So, Marianne will be 20 + 11 = <<20+11=31>>31 years old then.
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
